message.content:
cs.SY, cs.SI, cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.NE 

The paper deals with signal reconstruction, which is a topic that falls under several sub-categories in computer science. The use of sampled-data control theory suggests that the paper may belong to the cs.SY (Systems and Control) sub-category. The applications in sound and image reconstruction suggest that the paper may also belong to the cs.SI (Sound and Image Processing) sub-category. The use of optimization criteria suggests that the paper may belong to the cs.IT (Information Theory) sub-category. The comparison to alternative methods suggests that the paper may belong to the cs.LG (Machine Learning) sub-category. Finally, the use of stable and causal solutions suggests that the paper may belong to the cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) sub-category.
